sections.heading: AND OBLIGATIONS OF THENAKED OWNERArt
sections.text: 603. Disposition of the naked ownership; alienation or encumbrance of the propertyThe naked owner may dispose of the naked ownership, but he cannot thereby affect the usufruct.Acts 1976, No. 103, ยง1; Acts 2010, No. 881, ยง1, eff. July 2, 2010.
